reviews.review_msg: Lisa has an incredible resume. However, her teaching ability does not reflect it in the least. She has a pleasant personality but her lecturing is convoluted and innane. She doesn't make eye contact and doesn't seem to have any true grasp or understanding of what she is teaching.

IF YOU CAN AVOID THIS CLASS, AVOID IT!! The online version of this class is out of this world. The most difficult undergrad course i have ever taken. The prof is unavailable to help you and the TA is takes forever, to mark and answer questions. I would follow the instructions for the assignments and still do horrible.
